title: SSZCode Community Edition
description: SSZCode CE adds Save and Load Strings and Arrays of Strings to and from files. Create a curve on the fly and evaluate it. Create a curve with multiple points on it and evaluate it. As well as a bunch of new Loops
longDescription:
SSZCode CE Features


File I/O Functions


SaveStringToFile + LoadStringFromFile

Saves a the String to a file at a given path.


Loads a file and returns the contents as a String.

SaveStringArrayToFile + LoadStringArrayFromFile


Saves the Array of String to a file at a given path.

Loads a file and returns the contents as an Array of Strings.


Copy / Move / Delete File (New in V2.0 UE4.25)



New Curve Nodes


Quick Curve

Creates an On the fly Curve with 2 points then evaluates a point along the newly created curve.


QuickCurveMultiPoint

Creates an On the fly Curve with multiple points. 



New Loops


WhileLoopWithDelay

InfiniteLoop

InfiniteLoopWithDelay



New Math Nodes


IntAddFloat

IntSubFloat

IntMultiplyFloat

IntDivideFloat

Add Array of Floats (New in V2.0 UE4.25)

Subtract Array of Floats (New in V2.0 UE4.25)



New in-editor Documentation builder method & Helpful reference nodes


(New in 3.1) Security Features

(New in 3.1) Encrypt / Decrypt Strings (Based on AES 256)

(New in 3.1) Random String Generator (Uppercase, Lowercase, Numbers) + Custom based on user-defined Arrays of Strings


(New in 3.1) Shema Maker

Check inside of the plugins content help folder for an example of turning the most common variables into a custom schema that can be then be saved to a Single String.

(You may need to show engine content or plugin content before the SSZCode content folder is visible within your projects content folder list)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Save & Load String Nodes
  • On The Fly Curve Creation Nodes
  • More Loops
  • Encrypt / Decrypt / Random String Generator
  • Custom Schema Maker


Code Modules:

  •  SSZMathFunctions (Runtime, Editor]
  •  SSZFileFunctions (Runtime, Editor]
  •  UtilityFunctions (Runtime, Editor]
  • Encryption (Runtime, Editor]


Number of Blueprints: 6

Number of C++ Classes: 4

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Android, Oculus VR, Steam VR

Documentation: https://ssz.ca/site/product/sszcode-community-edition

Support: https://ssz.ca/chat
